oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: York, Alvin Cullum, 1887-1964; Election -- Statistics; Primaries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Democratic Primary Board election returns signed by Alvin York as Chairman of the Democratic Primary Board of Fentress County. The return features the primary votes for Horton and Gwinn for Governor; Dodson, Hull, and Todd for U.S. Senator (long term); Brock and Neal for U.S. Senator (short term); Albright, Mitchell, and Owen for Congress; Anderson and Officer for State Senator; and Stockton and Taylor for Floterial Representative.

Alvin York was one of the most decorated American soldiers in World War I. He was awarded a Medal of Honor and a French Croix de Guerre for taking a German machine gun nest and assisting in the capture of 132 German soldiers.
